sql.if: and (CASE WHEN (A.PLANSTARTTIME > #CURRENTTIMESTR:DATE# AND H.ITEMNAME = 'INI') OR H.ITEMNAME = 'SSP' THEN '0' WHEN (H.ITEMNAME = 'COP' AND A.ACTUALFINISHTIME > A.PLANFINISHTIME) OR (A.ACTUALFINISHTIME IS NULL AND #CURRENTTIMESTR:DATE# > A.PLANFINISHTIME) THEN '1' WHEN (A.PLANSTARTTIME < #CURRENTTIMESTR:DATE# AND H.ITEMNAME = 'INI') OR (H.ITEMNAME = 'RUN' AND A.SPI < 1) THEN '2' WHEN (H.ITEMNAME = 'RUN' AND A.SPI >= 1) OR (H.ITEMNAME = 'COP' AND A.PLANFINISHTIME >= A.ACTUALFINISHTIME) THEN '3' END) = #ONTIMESTATE#

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) rowcount$$ FROM $TASKTABLENAME$ A INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT X.GUID, X.MD_ID, X.MD_NAME, X.OWNERUSER, X.OWNERGROUP FROM $PROJECTTABLENAME$ X INNER JOIN PPM_PROJECTROLE Y ON X.GUID = Y.TYPEGUID INNER JOIN PPM_ROLEMEMBERS Z ON Y.GUID = Z.PROJECTROLEGUID WHERE X.CLASSGUID = #CLASSGUID# AND Z.USERGUID = #USERGUID#) C ON A.OWNERPROJECT = C.GUID LEFT JOIN SA_USER E ON A.EXECUTOR = E.GUID LEFT JOIN SA_GROUP F ON A.OWNERGROUP = F.GUID LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL G ON A.EXECUTESTATUS = G.GUID LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL H ON A.EXECUTESTATUS = H.GUID WHERE 1=1
